remarks: Convert an operation cancellation law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
caovcang.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. T /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x F y ) = ( x F z ) <-> y = z ) ) $.
caovcang $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. T /\ B e. S /\ C e. S ) ) -> ( ( A F B ) = ( A F C ) <-> B = C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
